name: Träumerei: Chapter 1
storyline:
Once upon a time, beneath dreary branches obscuring a crimson sky, there lived a reclusive vampire who would love nothing more than to sleep, read, or die. After a certain tragedy befell him, the vampire, Noël Rousseau, resolved to hide himself away from the world. Locking himself away in a decaying house for nearly half a century with only his grandmother’s beloved books and decrepit button-eyed dolls for company, he was content……

Until…he meets a cheerful, rosy eyed girl in the outskirts of the woods one dark, dreary day. Upon following the strange girl, Noël realizes there was more to his XXXX’s death beneath the surface.

“Je suis perdu…aide moi……”
summary:
Träumerei is an original Horror RPG game created in VX Ace. The game is focused on exploration, story, and characters. It contains original art, graphics, and sprites.

This game requires you to install the RPG Maker VX Ace RTP to play! It is also not necessary to have played Chapter 0 before this as the demo is non-canon.
